item.title: SHOW: I created 3D avatars library for your products
item.dc:creator: SamuelBriskar
item.description:
Hey guys,
I just want to get your honest feedback on our library.

More information:
AVATARZ is a lovely 3D library of diverse avatars for any of your projects. You can use them in your products or for marketing purposes (social media posts, landing pages, blogs, newsletters, etc.). Or if you want - for your personal use.

What is included?

â€” 2000+ PNG files

of different avatars - which you can use in any designer software, such as Photoshop, Sketch, Figma, Studio, or Illustrator. It contains:

â€¢ 2 rigged upper bodies of man & woman

â€¢ 3 types of clothes,

â€¢ 4 types of eyeglasses,

â€¢ 14 types of hairs,

â€¢ 4 types of facial expression,

â€¢ 3 color skins as a bonus

= 2 000+ combinations

â€” Blender source files

â€” Blender generator for easier manipulation with the avatar

1920Ã—1080 428 KB
